article: We always want what we cannot have.When we"re young,we want to stay out late,have romantic relationships,and be _ .However,when we"re _ ,we want to go back to beingyoung and we _ the days when we didn"t have to worry about complex love affairs, _ pressure,and money problems. Life is _ .It gives us time to _ but also requires us to work.The time will come when we must grow up and we will always look back wishing we _ being young a bit longer.That time will not come back.It is normal to want what we cannot have but the _ is that to be happyis to appreciate what we have.That is the first step to grow up. _ life becomes more complex,we will not regret the time we wasted wishing we were adults.
